job_tasks.phrase: ensuring the successful adoption and utilization of our AI-driven solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the goal of making AI solutions work within a customer's environment, which involves integrating them into existing workflows and ensuring they are used effectively, fitting the definition of integrating solutions into user-facing applications.

job_tasks.phrase: facilitate the seamless launch of new products
job_tasks.justification: This relates to the deployment and integration of products, which are core software engineering activities.

job_tasks.phrase: managing beta testing phases to gather critical feedback on product features and issues
job_tasks.justification: Beta testing is a crucial part of the software development lifecycle, focused on identifying and resolving issues before a wider release.

job_tasks.phrase: providing ongoing support and guidance to users post-release.
job_tasks.justification: Post-release support and guidance are part of the maintenance and operational aspects of software, aligning with integration and ensuring the product functions as intended for the user.

job_tasks.phrase: working closely with product development teams to identify, document, and address any product issues or enhancements.
job_tasks.justification: This directly involves the software development lifecycle, focusing on issue resolution and product improvement, which are core software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Act as a liaison between the end-users and the technical team, translating technical information into user-friendly language.
job_tasks.justification: This involves bridging communication gaps within the software development process, ensuring technical aspects are understood by users, which is an integration-related activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitor product performance and user experience post-release, offering proactive support and troubleshooting assistance.
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring and troubleshooting are essential for maintaining software in production and ensuring its successful operation, fitting under the broader umbrella of software integration and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: Collect and analyze user feedback to inform future product developments and improvements.
job_tasks.justification: This task is directly related to the iterative process of software development, using feedback to guide enhancements and new features.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide prompt engineering and best practices on the use of the solution to achieve the best results and outcomes.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions 'prompt engineering' and guiding users on best practices for using AI solutions, which directly maps to this category.

soft_skills.justification: Delivering training requires clear communication and the ability to convey information effectively to users.

soft_skills.phrase: Act as a liaison between the end-users and the technical team, translating technical information into user-friendly language.
soft_skills.justification: This is a direct example of communication and collaboration, acting as a bridge between different groups.

soft_skills.phrase: Maintain up-to-date knowledge of AI technology trends and best practices to provide expert advice and support to our customers.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the need to continuously learn and adapt to new AI trends to provide effective customer support.

soft_skills.phrase: offering proactive support and troubleshooting assistance.
soft_skills.justification: Troubleshooting and providing proactive support are core problem-solving activities.

soft_skills.phrase: Collect and analyze user feedback to inform future product developments and improvements.
soft_skills.justification: Using feedback to drive product improvements demonstrates a proactive and ownership-oriented approach to product evolution.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on tasks related to ensuring the successful adoption, utilization, and support of AI-driven solutions within customer environments. While it mentions 'prompt engineering' (1.B.2), the majority of the responsibilities fall under traditional software engineering activities like training, beta testing, liaison between users and technical teams, monitoring, troubleshooting, and using feedback for product development (all classified under 1.A.1). There is no mention of core model development, fine-tuning, or advanced AI/ML research. The role is about integrating and supporting AI solutions rather than building them from the ground up. Therefore, 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' is the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to customer success and support for AI products. The tasks are predominantly in the 'Software Development & Integration' category, with a specific mention of prompt engineering. The distinction between this role and a core AI/ML engineer is clear. The confidence is high, but not perfect (5), as the role is customer-facing and support-oriented, which is a slight variation from a pure 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' who might be more directly involved in the product's technical integration within the company's own systems rather than external customer systems.
